title: Ultimate/Legendary Lucian Skin idea
body:
It should be fairly obvious as to whom I'm referring to here for this idea but Senna replacing Lucian on the fields of justice. New set of quotes, animations, unique interactions and a whole new look on Lucian situation. whether or not she is a green gassy creature that recently escaped Thresh's lantern or if she was the one to survive the attack that allows the swap either way i personally believe this skin HAS to exist at some point in time. 
"FOR LUCIAN!" -Senna

replies.body: Senna's gone... it wouldn't make sense to have a skin for her.

Skins aren't just to change the appearance of a champion but as a re-imagining of them for example infernal Nasus isn't Nasus from Shruima but from the fiery depths of hell. in this case its from an alternate timeline when thresh claimed Lucian instead of Senna. 
maybe link it in with the blood moon skins?
Lucian won't get an Ult Skin for agesssssssssss. It'll be a mid/top next and THEN an adc
but all of his skins SUCK and this would be amazing to play as! and who knows maybe... just maybe riot will see this and be like "yeah m8 lets do it"

I personally don't think they're too bad and nah dude Riot is pretty keen on following certain orders of things usually. Plus, you wouldn't really be playing Lucian anymore, like, I don't think this would EVER happen.

why not? its a different take on his lore and you aren't really playing Blitzcrank when you use definitely not Blitzcrank skin, you are playing Steve from accounting. you aren't really playing anyone when you use their skins you are playing a different take on the champion with the same stats and skill set.
